3 namespace Ubiquity\db\traits;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\database\DbCache;
7 use Ubiquity\exceptions\CacheException;
8 use Ubiquity\db\SqlUtils;
9 
19 class DatabaseOperationsTrait {
20 
25  protected $pdoObject;
26  private $statements = [ ];
27 
28  abstract public function getDSN();
29 
30  public function getPdoObject() {
31  return $this->pdoObject;
32  }
33 
34  public function _connect() {
35  $this->options [\PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE] = \PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION;
36  $this->pdoObject = new \PDO ( $this->getDSN (), $this->user, $this->password, $this->options );
37  }
38 
45  public function query($sql) {
46  return $this->pdoObject->query ( $sql );
47  }
48 
58  public function prepareAndExecute($tableName, $condition, $fields, $parameters = null, $useCache = NULL) {
59  $cache = ((DbCache::$active && $useCache !== false) || (! DbCache::$active && $useCache === true));
60  $result = false;
61  if ($cache) {
62  $cKey = $condition;
63  if (is_array ( $parameters )) {
64  $cKey .= implode ( ",", $parameters );
65  }
66  try {
67  $result = $this->cache->fetch ( $tableName, $cKey );
68  Logger::info ( "Cache", "fetching cache for table {$tableName} with condition : {$condition}", "Database::prepareAndExecute", $parameters );
69  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
70  throw new CacheException ( "Cache is not created in Database constructor" );
71  }
72  }
73  if ($result === false) {
74  if ($fields = SqlUtils::getFieldList ( $fields, $tableName )) {
75  $result = $this->prepareAndFetchAll ( "SELECT {$fields} FROM `" . $tableName . "`" . $condition, $parameters );
76  if ($cache) {
77  $this->cache->store ( $tableName, $cKey, $result );
78  }
79  }
80  }
81  return $result;
82  }
83 
84  public function prepareAndFetchAll($sql, $parameters = null) {
85  $result = false;
86  $statement = $this->getStatement ( $sql );
87  if ($statement->execute ( $parameters )) {
88  Logger::info ( "Database", $sql, "prepareAndFetchAll", $parameters );
89  $result = $statement->fetchAll ();
90  }
91  $statement->closeCursor ();
92  return $result;
93  }
94 
95  public function prepareAndFetchAllColumn($sql, $parameters = null, $column = null) {
96  $result = false;
97  $statement = $this->getStatement ( $sql );
98  if ($statement->execute ( $parameters )) {
99  Logger::info ( "Database", $sql, "prepareAndFetchAllColumn", $parameters );
100  $result = $statement->fetchAll ( \PDO::FETCH_COLUMN, $column );
101  }
102  $statement->closeCursor ();
103  return $result;
104  }
105 
106  public function prepareAndFetchColumn($sql, $parameters = null, $columnNumber = null) {
107  $statement = $this->getStatement ( $sql );
108  if ($statement->execute ( $parameters )) {
109  Logger::info ( "Database", $sql, "prepareAndFetchColumn", $parameters );
110  return $statement->fetchColumn ( $columnNumber );
111  }
112  return false;
113  }
114 
120  private function getStatement($sql) {
121  if (! isset ( $this->statements [$sql] )) {
122  $this->statements [$sql] = $this->pdoObject->prepare ( $sql );
123  $this->statements [$sql]->setFetchMode ( \PDO::FETCH_ASSOC );
124  }
125  return $this->statements [$sql];
126  }
127 
134  public function execute($sql) {
135  return $this->pdoObject->exec ( $sql );
136  }
137 
144  public function prepareStatement($sql) {
145  return $this->pdoObject->prepare ( $sql );
146  }
147 
156  public function bindValueFromStatement(\PDOStatement $statement, $parameter, $value) {
157  return $statement->bindValue ( ":" . $parameter, $value );
158  }
159 
165  public function lastInserId() {
166  return $this->pdoObject->lastInsertId ();
167  }
168 
169  public function getTablesName() {
170  $sql = 'SHOW TABLES';
171  $query = $this->pdoObject->query ( $sql );
172  return $query->fetchAll ( \PDO::FETCH_COLUMN );
173  }
174 
182  public function count($tableName, $condition = '') {
183  if ($condition != '')
184  $condition = " WHERE " . $condition;
185  return $this->query ( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM " . $tableName . $condition )->fetchColumn ();
186  }
187 
188  public function queryColumn($query, $columnNumber = null) {
189  return $this->query ( $query )->fetchColumn ( $columnNumber );
190  }
191 
192  public function fetchAll($query) {
193  return $this->query ( $query )->fetchAll ();
194  }
195 
196  public function isConnected() {
197  return ($this->pdoObject !== null && $this->pdoObject instanceof \PDO && $this->ping ());
198  }
199 
200  public function ping() {
201  return ($this->pdoObject && 1 === intval ( $this->pdoObject->query ( 'SELECT 1' )->fetchColumn ( 0 ) ));
202  }
203 }
